Translated By: Carlos Xu and imba-tjd
Gitter &mdash; Where developers come to: Gitter — 开发者交谈的地方
Gitter is a chat and networking platform: Gitter 是一个聊天和网络平台，通过消息、内容和发现，帮助管理、发展和连接社区。
By signing up you agree to our <a %s>Ter: 注册即表示同意我们的服务条款和隐私政策
Enjoy free public and private communitie: 无限人员、历史消息和集成，享受自由的公共和私有社区。
Simply create your community and start t: 只需创建您的社区并开始交谈 - 无需设置任何邀请服务。
Format your messages just like with your: 就像在用您平常喜欢用的开发工具一样格式化您的讯息。
Complete history archives(indexed by sea: 完整的历史文件（通过搜寻引擎索引）和可分享的永久链接或使用 Sidecar 將 Gitter 嵌入至您的網站。
Let’s talk about Gitter!: 我们来谈谈 Gitter 吧！
Gitter is designed to make community mes: Gitter 旨在使社区消息传递，协作和发现尽可能顺畅和简单。 您可以轻松创建，组织和发展您的社区，只需单击一下即可邀请其他人加入。
We also provide integrations with GitHub: 我们还提供与 GitHub, Trello, Jenkins, Travis CI, Heroku, Sentry, BitBucket, HuBoard, Logentries, Pagerduty 以及 Sprintly 的集成。 我们同样支持自定义的 webhook，为集成提供了开源库以及灵活的API。
Gitter is nothing without the people usi: 如果没有大家的支持，Gitter 什么也不是。
We asked a few people what Gitter means: 我们采访了一些用户，Gitter 对他们意味着什么，这里是他们的话。如果你也喜欢 Gitter，在 Twitter 上%s，我们每个月都会更新这些留言。
Pricing plans are coming early 2017. Joi: Pricing plans are coming early 2017. Join the Earlybird programme now and get a 75%% discount.
Prices may be subject to VAT. By signing: Prices may be subject to VAT. By signing up you agree to our Terms and Conditions.
Limited to 25 users per private room: 每个私有聊天室最多25人
<b>Customisable look</b> of the communit: 可定制的 社区聊天室外观
Gitter is available in all modern browse: Gitter 支持所有现代浏览器，并为桌面设备和移动电话提供了应用程序。
Our efforts are focused on the <a %s>web: 我们的工作重点是网页端的 webapp，它也是移动/桌面应用的支柱。桌面/移动客户端存在一些bug，但我们无法给予它们较多关注，否则 Gitter 团队会太分散。如果您愿意解决一些特别烦人的问题，这些程序是开源的。
Learn more about <a %s>creating communit: 了解如何 创建社区 和 创建聊天室。
Mac users on 10.9 or lower, <a %s>downlo: 使用 10.9 或更低版本的 Mac 用户, 在此处下载。
We also have a sweet little <a %s>IRC br: 我们还有一款小巧可爱的 IRC bridge。
Gitter is available in all modern browse: Gitter is available in all modern browsers as well as apps for desktops.
The above Mac installer is a signed vers: The above Mac installer is a signed version of 1.177 (backed by Safari). For an unsigned 4.1.0 installer (backed by NW.js), click here to download.
The dedicated Android/iOS apps are no lo: The dedicated Android/iOS apps are no longer recommended and may be officially deprecated in the future. For mobile, we recommend using the mobile web version in your browser.
The above Mac installer is a signed vers: The above Mac installer is a signed version of 1.177 (backed by Safari). For an unsigned 5.0.1 installer (backed by NW.js), click here to download.
